Last one My birthday track Song 0 is "So Tight" by @MrGregDulli The best Friday song ever written #40SongsFor40Years https://t.co/mkuscqyaHl
Song 40 released 2014 "Chandelier" by @Sia Beautiful lyrics with soaring vocals. One more to go. #40SongsFor40Years https://t.co/ZF2EjVqEMJ
Song 39 released 2013 "I Wanna be Yours" by @ArcticMonkeys A fantastic song by a brilliant band #40SongsFor40Years https://t.co/CM64oqTrNk
Song 38 came out in 2012 "Somebody that I used to know" by @gotye Great lyrics & classic video #40SongsFor40Years https://t.co/VU50m4LVv8
Song 37 came out in 2011 "Back down South" by @KingsOfLeon A very special road trip to Carolina #40SongsFor40Years https://t.co/twzI74ZgQy
Song 36 came out as a single in 2010 "This is War" by @30SECONDSTOMARS An inspiring battle cry #40SongsFor40Years https://t.co/YZPJCgCkvM
Song 35 came out in 2009 "To Lose My Life" by @whiteliesmusic The spirit of Joy Division #40SongsFor40Years https://t.co/nukSBZ1JyM
Song 34 out in 2008 "The Pretender" by @foofighters Vital tune by a band on top of their game #40SongsFor40Years https://t.co/X5Wl25Pthi
Song 33 out in 2007 "I still remember" by @BlocParty A fantastic song about missed opportunity #40SongsFor40Years https://t.co/2lqjnoh6SV
Song 32 out in 2006 is "Supermassive Black Hole" by Muse Astronomy and glaciology combine. #40SongsFor40Years https://t.co/7JGFbQoB6R
@PsycheDK they put on one of the best shows I've seen. The music is relentless.

Song 30 out in 2004 is "Amazing" by @GeorgeMichael Brilliant vocals and a great song to chill to #40SongsFor40Years https://t.co/0lDqV6XE8R
